Entries.Wed: I don't know what I'm going to do without Emily... it's a lot of work in here for one person.$s#$e#I think I might have to clean all these dishes by myself...$s

Entries.Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#He looks really sad, honestly. Like he's looking for someone who isn't there. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.
I miss when Clint would come here. He wouldn't talk to anyone; he'd just sulk and look at Emily, but still... I do miss him.$s

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Hey. I heard what you did with that old trailer! That was really really nice of you!$h#$e#It's a shame Pam couldn't enjoy it, but I don't think that makes it a waste...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: It's a shame Pam didn't get to enjoy her new house... but I don't think that makes it a waste. It'll do some good for someone. A good deed is a good deed, after all.
Entries.Thu8: Pam used to come into the saloon almost every night and drink way too much beer.#$e#Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgement on the dead.

Entries.Thu: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if he stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive him away!
Pam comes into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if she stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive her away!
I've lost my best customers...$s#$e#Do you ever worry about running out of money, @?$s#$e#Sometimes I just want to run away from this town.$s

Entries.fall_4.000: Getting a checkup makes me nervous... What if I only have a few years left? I'm not at peace with the world yet!
Entries.fall_4.001: It's my liver, isn't it, nurse? I can see it on your face. *Sigh*... I really need to cut back on that sweet, delicious Stardew Valley wine.$s

Entries.fall_4.000: Coming here makes me nervous... What if I only have a few years left? I'm not at peace with the world yet!
Entries.fall_4.001: It's my liver, isn't it, Magnus? I can see it on your magenta, spectral face. *Sigh*... I really need to cut back on that sweet, delicious Stardew Valley wine.$s

Entries.Mon.000: I'm getting some supplies for the saloon. The General Store's always got the good stuff.$h
